description:
Realtime broadcasting air quality information for cities in China.

Features:

- Provide data from more than 1200 monitoring stations for over 200 cities.
- Show air quality information from your nearest monitoring station.
- Support data from US Embassy / US Consulate in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Chengdu and Shenyang.

- Detailed weather information: you can check the temperature, wind, humidity, visibility and other information, as well as forecast for the next 24 hours and the coming week. We highlight the wind information for you to determine the future trend of air quality.

- Map mode: check China air quality status in a panoramic view.
- Show realtime air quality index on app icon. Check out the air quality without opening the app.
- When the air pollution increased, we will send you a remind notification.

- New Design, New Experience: For the iPhone and iPad their own characteristics, we designed different UI for each. Lots of original designs present a new experience.

- Historical Data Review: You can view the short-term trends of air pollution index, and check the distribution of air pollution grades for up to 2 years.

- Healthy Advice: According to the current air situation, basic advices are given: whether suitable for outdoor sports, whether need to wear masks. And what protective measures should do when you indoor, do outdoor sports, on traffic, we had more specific suggestion for you.



- Share with friends: You can send current air quality data and screenshot to Friend via Facebook, Twitter, Sina Weibo, Tencent Weibo, SMS via Email.
releaseNotes: Changelog for this version was redacted due to some reasons.
